data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio dos Arcos have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 3, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Yusupha Njie of Boavista gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Boavista in the half of Rio Ave.
Joao Bento awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
Rio Ave have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Free kick Rio Ave.
Rio Ave's Diego Lopes is on target but unsuccessful.
In Vila do Conde Boavista drive forward through Gustavo Sauer. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a Boavista throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In the minute 19, Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Rio Ave surge into the attack at Estadio dos Arcos but Carlos Maneâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Boavista drive forward but Javi Garcia is judged offside.
Boavista needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, Cristian Devenish is replacing Adil Rami for the away team.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Rio Ave.
Chico Geraldes (Rio Ave) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gelson Dala gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rio Ave.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Rio Ave's Carlos Mane has been booked in Vila do Conde.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Angel Gomes for Boavista who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
In the minute 40, Angel Gomes is back on the pitch.
Rio Ave's Chico Geraldes has run offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Vila do Conde.
In the minute 42, Rio Ave's Filipe Augusto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila do Conde.
Boavista have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Show is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
Boavista's Show is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio dos Arcos.
The second-half is underway at Estadio dos Arcos.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 47, Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 49, Rio Ave's Aderllan Santos attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio dos Arcos.
Boavista have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Boavista.
Joao Bento signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Boavista's half.
Can Rio Ave capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Boavista's half?
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 56, Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Angel Gomes for Boavista gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, Joao Bento awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
Pedro Amaral for Rio Ave is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 62, Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick Rio Ave.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
Boavista's Show breaks free at Estadio dos Arcos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
In the minute 69, Vasco Seabra is making the team's second substitution at Estadio dos Arcos with Alberth Elis replacing Yusupha Njie.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Gabrielzinho is on a sub for Chico Geraldes for Rio Ave.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Boavista's half.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Joao Bento signals a throw-in for Rio Ave, close to Boavista's area.
In the minute 75, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
The home team replace Diego Lopes with Andre Pereira.
In the minute 77, Alberth Elis of Boavista is pulled up for offside.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
In the minute 78, Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Boavista are caught offside.
Gelson Dala of Rio Ave smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 80, Free kick Rio Ave.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Mangas is replacing Gustavo Sauer for Boavista at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 81, Boavista make their fourth substitution with Nuno Valente Santos replacing Angel Gomes.
Gama (Rio Ave) is making a third substitution, with Ryotaro Meshino replacing Ivo Pinto.
Joao Bento signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Boavista's half.
In the minute 82, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Vila do Conde.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Boavista.
Nuno Valente Santos (Boavista) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Boavista are coming forward and Javi Garcia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Joao Bento awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Rio Ave are pushing forward but Ryotaro Meshino's finish is wide of the goal.
Boavista have a goal kick.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila do Conde.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
